reviewText: A convict escapes from prison with the help of his girlfriend. They kidnap a girl who was interested in him also. Focus is on prolonged escape. Love interest subplot and revenge subplot. If you like film noir or are looking for a good example of film noir, this movie is for you. Incredible cinematography with eerie, atmospheric soundtrack. Action, suspense, and drama from the beginning. Great noir. If you appreciate film as an art form, this is a must see movie.
